channel.title: Perm change IP=OK, but it show me old settings!
channel.description: Hello, sorry for my bad English. I download 1 server and client and now i need help. I dont know, how i can change IP in client...i want my IP but here is some xxx-xx.no-ip.biz =) Please help, thanks

item.title: Perm change IP=OK, but it show me old settings!

item.description:

Open it with run.bat

item.title: Perm change IP=OK, but it show me old settings!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Peckaa, post:3, topic:297418”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=393454.msg2927891#msg2927891 date=1251114491]
In the client folder open EGUI.java and change the ip.
[/quote]
Thanks, i did it but client show me old IP and settings.[/quote]

If you didn’t compile and then run, you might have another file called “Gui.java” or “Jframe.java” search it in there, also in client.java.

Read full topic
